name: trello

createCard.title: Create new card
createCard.description: Create a card and add it to a list

listId.description: ID of the list in which to insert the new card

cardBody.description: Body text of the new card

members.description: Members to add to the card (Optional). This should be a list of member IDs.

labels.description: Labels to add to the card (Optional). This should be a list of label IDs.

dueDate.description: The due date of the card in ISO 8601 format (Optional).

schema.description: Input schema for creating a new card

newCardId.description: Unique identifier of the new card

schema.description: Output schema for creating a card

moveCardUp.title: Move card up
moveCardUp.description: Move a card n spaces up

moveUpByNSpaces.description: Number of spaces by which to move the card up

schema.description: Output schema for moving a card up

moveCardDown.title: Move card down
moveCardDown.description: Move a card n spaces down

moveDownByNSpaces.description: Number of spaces by which to move the card down

schema.description: Output schema for moving a card down

moveCardToList.title: Move card to another list
moveCardToList.description: Move a card to another list within the same board

newListId.description: Unique identifier of the list in which the card will be moved

schema.description: Output schema for moving a card to a list

addCardComment.title: Add card comment
addCardComment.description: Add a new comment to a card

cardId.description: Unique identifier of the card to which a comment will be added

commentBody.description: The body text of the comment

schema.description: Input schema for adding a comment to a card

newCommentId.description: Unique identifier of the newly created comment

schema.description: Output schema for adding a comment to a card

updateCard.title: Update card
updateCard.description: Update the details of a card

name.description: The name of the card (Optional) (e.g. "My Test Card"). Leave empty to keep the current name.

bodyText.description: Body text of the new card (Optional). Leave empty to keep the current body.

closedState.description: Whether the card should be archived (Optional). Enter "open", "archived" (without quotes), or leave empty to keep the previous status.

completeState.description: Whether the card should be marked as complete (Optional). Enter "complete", "incomplete" (without quotes), or leave empty to keep the previous status.

membersToAdd.description: Members to add to the card (Optional). This should be a list of member IDs. Leave empty to keep the current members.

membersToRemove.description: Members to remove from the card (Optional). This should be a list of member IDs. Leave empty to keep the current members.

labelsToAdd.description: Labels to add to the card (Optional). This should be a list of label IDs. Leave empty to keep the current labels.

labelsToRemove.description: Labels to remove from the card (Optional). This should be a list of label IDs. Leave empty to keep the current labels.

dueDate.description: The due date of the card in ISO 8601 format (Optional). Leave empty to keep the current due date.

schema.description: Input schema for creating a new card
Output schema for updating a card
